#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

KvServer::KvServer(uint64_t maxraftstate=0) {
    maxraftstate_ = maxraftstate;
}

KvServer::~KvServer() {
  /* Your code here for server teardown */

}

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  mtx_.lock();
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  Log_info("Next Op Id %lu op_id_cnt %lu", ret, op_id_cnt_);
  mtx_.unlock();
  return ret;
}

std::shared_ptr<IntEvent> KvServer::CallStart(const int64_t& oid, shared_ptr<Marshallable> &cmd) {
    bool status = GetRaftServer().Start(cmd, &leader_term, &leader_index);
    verify(status);
    std::shared_ptr<IntEvent> e = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    ongoing_ops.insert({oid,e});
    Log_info("Waiting for event with value %d status %d", e->value_, e->status_);
    e->Wait(SERVER_TIMEOUT);

    Log_info("Waiting for event with value %d status %d", e->value_, e->status_);
    return e;
}

std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> KvServer::CreateCmd(int64_t server_op_id,
                                                  const string& k,
                                                  const string& v,
                                                  const string& op) {
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(server_op_id));
  s->data_.push_back(op);
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  if (op.compare("get") != 0) {
      s->data_.push_back(v);
  }
  // ongoing_ops should be list of coroutines/events that notify when onnext is called?
  std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  return cmd;
}

bool QueueOp(const int64_t& server_op_id, std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> &cmd) {
    return false;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {

  if (!GetRaftServer().IsLeader()) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  int64_t server_op_id = GetNextOpId();
  Log_info("Client Op_id %lu | Server Op_id %lu | Op_type put", oid, server_op_id);
  auto cmd = CreateCmd(server_op_id, k, v, std::string("put"));
  auto ev = CallStart(server_op_id, cmd);
  

  Log_info("Not waiting");
  if (ev->value_ == 1) {
    Log_info("PUT Key k %s Put value %s", k.c_str(), v.c_str());
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }


  if (ev->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  if (!GetRaftServer().IsLeader()) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  Log_info("Op_id %lu || Op_type append", oid);
  int64_t server_op_id = GetNextOpId();
  auto cmd = CreateCmd(server_op_id, k, v, std::string("append"));
  auto ev = CallStart(server_op_id, cmd);

  Log_info("Not waiting");
  if (ev->value_ == 1) {
    // KVUpdate(k,v);
    Log_info("APPEND Key k %s Appended value %s", k.c_str(), v.c_str());
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }


  if (ev->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
                    
  if (!GetRaftServer().IsLeader()) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  Log_info("Op_id %lu || Op_type get", oid);
  int64_t server_op_id = GetNextOpId();
  auto cmd = CreateCmd(server_op_id, k, "", std::string("get"));
  auto ev = CallStart(server_op_id, cmd);


  Log_info("Not waiting");
  if (ev->value_ == 1) {
    KVGet(k, v);
    if (!v->empty()) {
        Log_info("GET Response key %s v %s", k.c_str(), v->c_str());
        return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
  }
  if (ev->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  verify(v->data_[0].length() != 0);
  int64_t op_id = std::stol(v->data_[0]);
  mtx_.lock();
  if (ongoing_ops.find(op_id) != ongoing_ops.end()) {
    auto ev = ongoing_ops[op_id];
    Log_info("Op_id %d was committed on raft. Size of ongoing_ops %d", op_id, ongoing_ops.size());
    ev->Set(1);
    ongoing_ops.erase(op_id);
  }
  KVApply(m);
  mtx_.unlock();
}
void KvServer::KVApply (Marshallable& m) {
    auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
    if (v->data_[1] == "put") {
        KVPut(v->data_[2], v->data_[3]);
    } else if (v->data_[1] == "append") {
        KVUpdate(v->data_[2], v->data_[3]);
    }
}
void KvServer::KVPut(const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    mtx_.lock();
    if (kvstore_.find(k) == kvstore_.end()){
        kvstore_.insert({k,v});
    } else {
        kvstore_[k] = v;
    }
    mtx_.unlock();
}

void KvServer::KVUpdate(const string& k,
                      const string& v) {
    mtx_.lock();
    if (kvstore_.find(k) == kvstore_.end()){
        kvstore_.insert({k,v});
    } else {
        kvstore_[k] += v;
    }
    mtx_.unlock();
}

void KvServer::KVGet(const string& k,
                     string* v) {
    mtx_.lock();
    if (kvstore_.find(k) != kvstore_.end()){
        *v = kvstore_[k];
    }
    mtx_.unlock();
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
